column3: suggested as replacement genus name by Hooker for a unispecific genus Anemia Nutt.  (non Sw. 1806)
column4: was not validly published by either Hooker or Nuttall.  This is because the only species proposed was Anemia californica Nutt. (see Melbourne Code Art. 36.1 Ex. 1). [protologue: "There being already an Anemia among the Ferns
column5: perhaps Anemopsis might with propriety be adopted by Mr
